spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Arrid's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 26}). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

1e: {@spell power word heal} (he cannot use it on himself)

trait.name: Angelic Weapons
entries: Arrid's weapon attacks are magical. When Arrid uses any weapon, the weapon deals an extra {@damage 6d8} radiant damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Anger of a Gentle Soul
entries: If Arrid sees an ally reduced to 0 hit points, he can use his reaction to grant himself a +20 bonus to his melee damage against the aggressor until the end of his next turn.

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: Arrid knows if he hears a lie.

trait.name: Golden Wings
entries: Arrid regenerates 30 hit points at the start of his turns.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Arrid fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Arrid has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Solar Sight
entries: Arrid gains a +5 bonus to his Perception skill.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Arrid makes two attacks with his Golden Tower Shield.

action.name: Golden Tower Shield
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage plus 27 ({@damage 6d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Shockwave
entries: Arrid slams the ground with his powerful strength, using his shield, in a 30 feet radius around him. Every creature in the area must succeed on a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw, taking 40 ({@damage 6d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition stunned} until the end of Arrid's next turn on a failed save, or half as much damage and not be knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition stunned} on a successful one.

action.name: Merciful Execution {@recharge 5}
entries: Arrid attempts to execute a creature with his divine energy within his melee range. If the creature he chooses has 150 hit points or fewer, it dies. If Arrid does not want to kill the creature but instead knock it {@condition unconscious} they take 55 ({@damage 10d10}) radiant damage.

action.name: Healing Touch (5/Day)
entries: Arrid touches another creature. The target magically regains 100 ({@dice 20d8 + 10}) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

action.name: Gentle Wrath (1/Day)
entries: Arrid throws an extremely powerful punch towards a creature within 5 feet of him. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw, taking 62 ({@damage 10d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage plus 54 ({@damage 12d8}) radiant damage on a failed save or no damage on a succesful one.
